title: Roasted garlic and thyme beetroot
description: This sweet and earthy roasted beetroot recipe goes well with roast pork or chicken.
ingredients: 400g peeled fresh beetroot, cut into wedges
1 garlic bulb, cloves separated but unpeeled
The leaves of 5 fresh thyme sprigs

method.Step 1: Preheat the oven to 190°C/fan170°C/gas 5. Put 400g peeled fresh beetroot, cut into wedges, 1 garlic bulb, cloves separated but unpeeled, the leaves of 5 fresh thyme sprigs and 4 tbsp olive oil in a small roasting tin, toss together and season well. Roast for 40 minutes until the beetroot are tender. Serve with the whole garlic cloves.
